question_stem.en: A 26-year-old woman is evaluated for joint pain affecting the elbows, knees, and ankles for the past month. She has also experienced a dry cough and mild shortness of breath over the last 6 months. She is sexually active and takes oral contraceptives. Temperature is 37.2 C (99 F), blood pressure is 120/70 mm Hg, pulse is 84/min, and respirations are 16/min. On physical examination, the lungs are clear to auscultation. There is mild swelling and tenderness of the elbows, knees, and ankles. The lower extremities are tender to palpation and have scattered erythematous nodules. Chest x-ray reveals lung nodules and hilar fullness {{exhibit_1}}. Transbronchial biopsy shows large epithelioid cells, occasional giant cells, and no areas of necrosis.
question_stem.zh: 一名26岁的女性因过去一个月内影响肘部、膝盖和踝关节的关节疼痛而接受评估。在过去的6个月里，她还经历了干咳和轻微的呼吸急促。她有性生活并服用口服避孕药。体温37.2°C（99°F），血压120/70 mmHg，脉搏84次/分钟，呼吸16次/分钟。体格检查显示，肺部听诊清澈。肘部、膝盖和踝关节有轻微肿胀和压痛。下肢触诊有压痛，并散在红斑性结节。胸部X光片显示肺结节和肺门饱满 {{exhibit_1}}。经支气管活检显示大的上皮样细胞、偶尔的巨细胞，且无坏死区域。

question.en: Which of the following pharmacotherapies is most appropriate for the initial treatment of this patient?
question.zh: 以下哪种药物疗法最适合该患者的初始治疗？

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of sarcoidosis presentation, diagnosis, and initial management. It requires recognizing the constellation of symptoms (arthralgia, dyspnea, cough, erythema nodosum), radiographic findings (lung nodules, hilar fullness), and biopsy results (noncaseating granulomas) to arrive at the diagnosis and appropriate treatment.

The key to solving this question is to recognize the classic presentation of sarcoidosis and understand that oral glucocorticoids are the first-line treatment for symptomatic patients. Rule out other conditions based on their distinct clinical and pathological features.
summary.zh:
此题考察了对结节病的表现、诊断和初始处理的了解。它需要识别一系列症状（关节痛、呼吸困难、咳嗽、结节性红斑）、影像学发现（肺结节、肺门饱满）和活检结果（非干酪性肉芽肿），以得出诊断并进行适当的治疗。

解决此题的关键是认识到结节病的典型表现，并了解口服糖皮质激素是对症患者的一线治疗方法。根据其他疾病独特的临床和病理特征，排除其他情况。
